name: Summer Nostalgia
description:
Hi! This is a short game made for the Bored Pixel Jam. It contains about 5 minutes of gameplay and has two endings. The choices and answers you decide on will decide the ending. 

Summer Nostalgia is about a couple going on a roadtrip. Will their relationship survive the adventure? It was made by me (Remy Smit) in about two weeks. Music is by Eric Matyas (soundimage.org).

I hope you like it and let me know what you think about it. Any feedback is welcome. Follow me on Twitter if you want to follow my journey making games.

Controls

- Spacebar to continue

- Left mouse to make choices

- Escape to exit game

Enjoy!
